title: 光影崩溃
author: 草..
txt_content:
文件：#Fri Aug 23 22:56:09 CST 2019 DOF=true VOLUMETRIC_CLOUDS_SHADOWS_STEPS=VCS_CINEMATIC VOLUMETRIC_CLOUDS_SHADOWS=true RAYTRACE_QUALITY=RAYTRACE_CINEMATIC VOLUMETRIC_CLOUDS_QUALITY=VC_CINEMATIC VOLUMETRIC_CLOUDS=true REFLECT_3D_CLOUDS=true GI_QUALITY=GI_CINEMATIC shadowMapResolution=16384 VL_QUALITY=VL_CINEMATIC AERIAL_VL=true REFLECTED_CLOUDS_QUALITY_DIRECT=REFLECTED_CLOUDS_CINEMATIC RAIN_PUDDLES=true RAYTRACE_REFINES=REFINES_CINEMATIC SHADOW_QUALITY=SHADOW_CINEMATIC SPECULAR_QUALITY=SPECULAR_CINEMATIC VOLUMETRIC_CLOUDS_DIRECT_QUALITY=VCL_HIGH BLOOM_SAMPLES=BLOOM_ULTRA VL_COLOURED_SHADOW=true AMBIENT_SAMPLES=AMBIENT_CINEMATIC SHADOW_TYPE=SHADOW_PCSS REFLECTED_CLOUDS_QUALITY=REFLECTED_CLOUDS_CINEMATIC DOF_SAMPLES=DOF_CINEMATIC VL_CLOUD_SHADOW=true
@FHC红石 @xmdhs 打扰了，求解答。

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 没有错误报告吗，这个不是错误报告

replies.txt_content:
